title: Value Co-Creation Action Research for Disaster Response and Recovery

context.prior_knowledge: Basic concepts of disaster management and understanding of organizational collaboration processes
context.additional_context: Participatory action research in a smartphone-based LMS environment, focusing on real-life problem-solving through practical experience

learning_goals: Learners can derive at least three values of public-private sector collaboration in disaster response scenarios
Learners can draft disaster recovery plans using Geographic Information System (GIS)-based tools
Learners can design and implement interorganizational collaboration plans by applying participatory action research methodologies
Learners can perform real-time decision-making simulations using digital collaboration tools in smartphone environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
